casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the ESTATE OF Luis M. ACERRA. M-67/68 September Term 2018
080497 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 24, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of Richard K. Litwin for leave to file a motion for reconsideration as within time (M-67) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification (M-68) is denied.
